title: Pixel 4 XL is not transferring data, not android auto, not charging. Only charges with OEM ch.
content:
The phone used to work with all kind of cables for all its functions(transfer data, android auto, and charge battery), but suddenly it stop woroking. I can only use the OEM charger to charge the phone's battery, nothing else.
I have usb enabled to file transfer / android suto option in the developers mode.
As I said, it used to work, but from one day to another, it stopped.
Thanks.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
